text: Yasmin Mogahed (born 1980), is an international speaker and author, she focuses most of her work on spiritual and personal development. She received her B.S. Degree in Psychology and her Masters in Journalism and Mass Communications from the University of Wisconsin-Madison. == Publication == * Reclaim Your Heart ред FB Publishing ред * Love & Happiness: A collection of personal reflections and quotes ред FB Publishing ред * Healing the Emptiness: A Guide to emotional and spiritual well-being Yasmin Mogahed == References == == Other websites == * Official Website * Audios by Yasmin Mogahed Category:American Muslims Category:Living people Category:1980 births Category:Writers from Madison, Wisconsin Category:Egyptian writers Category:Naturalized citizens of the United States
title: Yasmin Mogahed
